Title: Creates a drug free zone for senior citizen residential grounds
Summary: Creates a drug free zone for senior citizen residential grounds by prohibiting the criminal sale of a controlled substance in or near any residential building, structure, facility, community or land contained within any such area, that is occupied or designated for occupancy by persons who are at least 65 years of age; defines such criminal sale as a class B felony; permits certain political subdivisions to place signs in certain highway locations indicating a drug free zone in connection with senior citizen residential grounds.
